entry.title: Meet our staff!
entry.content:
Meet our staff! Here you can find a picture and a quick description of everyone in the makerspace staff, along with an email for each if you have any questions.

Kay Bros

(she/her/hers)

kbros@umass.edu

Ask me about: Fabric, yarn, thread, LEDs, soft circuits, Arduino/Pi/Lilypad, accessibility, documentation, telescopes/optics

Julius Rosenthal

(he/him/his)

juliusrosent@umass.edu

Ask me about: All things automotive, general repairs & maintenance, hand/power/shop tools, machining, soldering

Philip Van

(he/him/his)

pvan@umass.edu

Ask me about: 3D design & printing, programming, woodworking, mechanical tools, machining

Tyler Kerwin

(he/him/his)

tkerwin@umass.edu

Ask me about: Woodworking, construction, drones, mapping, econ/trading

Jeremy Paradie

(he/him/his)

jparadie@umass.edu https://www.jeremyparadie.com/

Ask me about: Batteries, motors, microcontrollers, enclosures, wiring, piezos, servos, power supplies, general electronics, high voltage, tools and machines, design, rapid prototyping, surface mount soldering, reverse engineering, Processing, Arduino, mBed, 3d printing, robotics, Solidworks, Onshape, Altium, Tinkercad

Connor Loughman

(he/him/his)

cloughman@umass.edu

Ask me about: Soldering, math, coding, computer hardware/troubleshooting, woodworking, laser cutting

Jack Champagne

(he/him/his)

jrchampagne@umass.edu www.jackchampage.com

Ask me about: Programming (C++, Java, Python), CNC machining, electrical schematics, circuit design, component identification & description

Thomas O’Connor

(he/him/his)

thooconnor@umass.edu

Ask me about: Environmental studies, Geographic Information Systems (GIS), marketing

Navya Ravavarapu

(she/her/hers)

nravavarapu@umass.edu

Ask me about: Graphic design, marketing

Paolo Brandon

(he/him/his)

pbrandon@umass.edu

Ask me about: Machining, blacksmithing, woodworking, CAD, 3D printing, Illustrator, Photoshop, prototyping, LEGOs, poetry

Jessica Scott

(she/her/hers)

jessicascott@umass.edu

Ask me about: Puppet building, puppet mechs, adhesives, basic woodworking, basic casting & molding, basic sewing, soft-sculpture, mask-making, flat-patterning with foam, sculpting, jello and sugar glass

David Schottler

(he/him/his)

dschottler@umass.edu

Ask me about: Recreational costume design, popsicle sticks, foam crafting, Pepakura

Margaret Polsgrove

(she/her/hers)

mpolsgrove@umass.edu

Ask me about: Woodworking, basketry, leatherworking, welding, bike repair, Python, Excel, Matlab, Final Cut Pro, circuit debugging, servos/motors, soldering

Costanza Fusco

(she/her/hers)

costanzafusc@umass.edu

Ask me about: Woodworking, sewing and fiber art, leatherworking, resin casting and mold making, soldering, pattern drafting, painting, basic 3D modeling, LEDs and piezoelectronics, microscopy

Laurel Parsons

(she/her/hers)

laparsons@umass.edu

Ask me about: Programming, Android Studio, Arduino, basic circuitry, sewing, foamwork, soldering
